button.title: Replace Token Art
button.tooltip: Search and replace NPC tokens with Forgotten Adventures art

fuzzyThreshold.name: Fuzzy Search Threshold
fuzzyThreshold.hint: Lower values require closer matches (0.0 = exact, 1.0 = match anything). Default: 0.1

searchPriority.name: Search Priority
searchPriority.hint: Choose which source to search first for token art

autoReplace.name: Auto Replace on Match
autoReplace.hint: Automatically replace token if a high-confidence match is found

confirmReplace.name: Confirm Before Replace
confirmReplace.hint: Show confirmation dialog before replacing each token

fallbackFullSearch.name: Fallback to Full Search
fallbackFullSearch.hint: If no matches found in creature type category, search the entire index. Default: Off

searchSources.name: Search Sources
searchSources.hint: Select which sources to search for token art

additionalPaths.name: Additional Search Paths
additionalPaths.hint: Comma-separated list of additional paths to search for token art (e.g., tokens/monsters, assets/tokens)

useTVACache.name: Use TVA Cache
useTVACache.hint: Use Token Variant Art's pre-built image cache instead of scanning directories manually. Much faster if TVA is configured with your image paths. Default: On

refreshTVACache.name: Refresh TVA Cache Before Search
refreshTVACache.hint: Force refresh Token Variant Art's cache before searching. Enable if you've added new images. Default: Off

indexUpdateFrequency.name: Index Update Frequency
indexUpdateFrequency.hint: How often to automatically update the token image index from TVA/FA Nexus. Default: Weekly

debugMode.name: Debug Mode
debugMode.hint: Enable detailed console logging for troubleshooting. Logs search details, timing, and errors. Default: Off

dialog.title: Replace Token Art
dialog.noTokens: No NPC tokens found on the current scene
dialog.selectTypeFirst: Please select a creature type first
dialog.noResultsInCategory: No artwork found in this category

notifications.noTokens: No NPC tokens found on current scene
notifications.missingDeps: Token Variant Art or FA Nexus module recommended for best results
notifications.indexReady: Token index ready! {count} images indexed for fast search.
notifications.indexingStart: First-time setup: Building image index in background. This may take several minutes but only happens once.
notifications.indexingComplete: Index ready! {count} images indexed for fast search.
notifications.fuseLoadFailed: Failed to load search library. Check console for details.
notifications.processingError: Token Replacer FA encountered an error: {error}. Check console for details.

errors.tva_missing: Token Variant Art module is not installed or enabled
errors.tva_cache_empty: Token Variant Art cache is empty
errors.tva_cache_disabled: Token Variant Art static cache is disabled
errors.tva_still_caching: Token Variant Art is still building its cache
errors.cache_load_failed: Failed to load Token Variant Art cache
errors.network_error: Network error while accessing token images
errors.file_access_error: Unable to access token image files
errors.invalid_paths: One or more search paths are invalid
errors.fuse_load_failed: Failed to load Fuse.js search library
errors.index_build_failed: Failed to build token search index
errors.localStorage_full: Browser storage is full, cannot cache index

recovery.install_tva: Install and enable the Token Variant Art module from Foundry VTT's module manager
recovery.rebuild_cache: Open Token Variant Art settings and rebuild the image cache
recovery.enable_static_cache: Enable 'Store Mappings to Cache' in Token Variant Art settings
recovery.wait_for_cache: Wait a few minutes for Token Variant Art to finish building its cache, then try again
recovery.check_network: Check your network connection and try again
recovery.check_file_access: Verify that token image directories are accessible and permissions are correct
recovery.check_paths: Verify additional search paths in module settings are valid directories
recovery.reload_module: Try reloading the module or refreshing the page
recovery.check_console: Check the browser console (F12) for detailed error information
recovery.clear_storage: Clear browser localStorage or disable index caching in settings
recovery.disable_worker: If the issue persists, the module will fallback to main thread indexing
recovery.contact_support: If the problem continues, please report this issue on GitHub with console logs
